cards.title: PrintService Admin log reporting errors, exposing printing security and reliability risks.
cards.explanation: This card indicates 'PrintService Admin log reporting errors, exposing printing security and reliability risks.'. Investigate configuration, service state, permissions, and recent changes impacting this area.

troubleshooting.overview: This card indicates 'PrintService Admin log reporting errors, exposing printing security and reliability risks.'. Investigate configuration, service state, permissions, and recent changes impacting this area.

scenarios.title: Potential Issue – Firewall/network ACLs blocking ports
steps: Enable profiles and allow required ports.

scripts.name: Enable profiles & test
